mapper.select: SELECT _id, username, tag, title, content, time, readcount, (SELECT count(*) from comment_tb where content_id = c._id and menu_id = 1)commentcount FROM community_tb c Order BY _id DESC LIMIT #{displaypost},#{postnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_tb( tag, title, username, content, readcount ) VALUES (#{tag}, #{title}, #{username}, #{content}, #{readcount})
mapper.select: SELECT _id, tag, title, username, time, readcount, content FROM community_tb WHERE _id=#{_id}
